DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to extend a previously reported 1 year follow-up on carpal tunnel release, in matched diabetic and non-diabetic patients,to compare outcomes 5 years after surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Carpal Tunnel Release in Diabetic Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The Follow-up investigation includes: 1. Clinical examination of sensory and motor function 2. Generic and disease specific self-administered questionnaires 3. Nerve conduction study 4. Vibration threshold testing
DOC.criteria: diabetic and nondiabetic patients operated for carpal tunnel syndrome 5 years ago. previous carpal tunnel release in the hand under study clinical signs of nerve entrapment other than CTS cervical radiculopathy, inflammatory joint disease renal failure thyroid disorders previous wrist fracture on the affected side daily longterm exposure to vibrating tools pregnancy
